mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accom ( biz_id, user_id, availability, accom_type, biz_name, addr, tel, room_count, description, latitude, longitude, pool, parking, cafe, restaurant, store, sauna, laundry, fitness ) VALUES ( #{biz_id}, #{user_id}, #{availability}, #{accom_type}, #{biz_name}, #{addr}, #{tel}, #{room_count}, #{description}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{pool}, #{parking}, #{cafe}, #{restaurant}, #{store}, #{sauna}, #{laundry}, #{fitness} )
